text: “(Mfumu idasonkhanitsa akazi aja ndipo) idati: “Kodi nkhani yanu njotani pamene mudamulakalaka Yûsuf pomwe iye sakufuna?” Adati: “Hasha Lillah! (Tikudzitchinjiriza kwa Allah)! Ife sitidadziwe choipa chilichonse kwa iye. (Tidayesayesa kuti achite nafe choipa koma sadalole).” (Nayenso) mkazi wa nduna adati: “Tsopano choonadi chatsimikizika; ine ndine amene ndidamulakalaka pomwe iye sakufuna. Ndithu iye ndi mmodzi mwa owona.”
